body: What about the last girl? Where did she come from?

four years ago, the Black couloured hair love the Senpai.
The girl with glass was told by the Black hair. Somehow ended robbed his heart with sex
The black girl gone insane,and the glass girl got bullied till graduate
Too fucking lonely that she could only paid a dog who has been the only one friendly to her since then,
The day has come, the Senpai meets the glass girl again because her friendly dog somehow suggest on a walk
